newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin up five cents to 14.32 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin up five cents to 14.32 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price rose five cents to 14.32 ringgit ($5.77) a kg in tandem with an overnight rise on the London Metal Exchange, and support from Japanese buyers, traders.
"There was not much selling pressure because of the LME and some good buying came from Japan," said a trader.
There were bids for 82 tonnes, against offers of 70. Final turnover was 82 tonnes against 71 on Wednesday.
The local price was at a premium of $70 against London, from $65 on Wednesday.
